The general rule of the Steam sales is to never buy something that is not a flash/choice/daily deal. Everything that is 10%/20% cheaper and not one of those three has a high chance to get into one of those three categories and be even cheaper.

If the Game you want hasn't been made cheaper by the last day you can still get it then.
